name: Classic Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta according to package instructions.
In a separate pan, sauté garlic in olive oil.
Add diced tomatoes and cook until soft.
Mix with cooked pasta and garnish with fresh basil.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Cut chicken into small pieces and cook in a wok until no longer pink.
Add chopped vegetables and stir fry until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce and stir to combine.
Serve over rice.

name: Vegetable Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs in a bowl.
Chop vegetables into small pieces.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour in the eggs.
Add vegetables and cheese on one half of the omelette.
Fold the other half over and cook until eggs are set.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef in a pan, adding taco seasoning.
Warm taco shells according to package instructions.
Chop lettuce and tomato.
Assemble tacos with beef, vegetables, cheese, and sour cream.

name: Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Cut vegetables into bite-sized pieces and toss with olive oil.
Place salmon and vegetables on a baking sheet.
Squeeze lemon over salmon.
Roast for 20-25 minutes until salmon is cooked through and vegetables are tender.

name: Vegan Chickpea Curry
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in a pot.
Add curry powder and stir for 1 minute.
Add chickpeas and coconut milk.
Simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve over rice.

name: Gluten-Free Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side.

name: Dairy-Free Chocolate Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Add wet ingredients and stir until combined.
Pour into a greased cake pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until a toothpick inserted comes out clean.

name: Nut-Free Granola Bars
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F (165°C).
Mix oats, dried fruit, and seeds in a bowl.
Heat honey and coconut oil until combined.
Pour over dry ingredients and mix well.
Press into a lined baking pan.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, then cool before cutting into bars.

name: Shellfish-Free Seafood Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a separate pan, cook fish until flaky.
Add tomato sauce and garlic, simmer for 5 minutes.
Combine with pasta and garnish with parsley.
